elementalBurst.description: Yoimiya leaps into the air along with her original creation, the "Ryuukin Saxifrage," and fires forth blazing rockets bursting with surprises that deal AoE Pyro DMG and mark one of the hit opponents with Aurous Blaze. Aurous Blaze: All Normal/Charged/Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts by any party member other than Yoimiya that hit an opponent marked by Aurous Blaze will trigger an explosion, dealing AoE Pyro DMG. When an opponent affected by Aurous Blaze is defeated before its duration expires, the effect will pass on to another nearby opponent, who will inherit the remaining duration.

passiveTalents.name: Tricks of the Trouble-Maker
passiveTalents.description: During Niwabi Fire-Dance, shots from Yoimiya's Normal Attack will increase her Pyro DMG Bonus by 2% on hit. This effect lasts for 3s and can have a maximum of 10 stacks.

passiveTalents.name: Summer Night's Dawn
passiveTalents.description: Using Ryuukin Saxifrage causes nearby party members (not including Yoimiya) to gain a 10% ATK increase for 15s. Additionally, a further ATK Bonus will be added on based on the number of "Tricks of the Trouble-Maker" stacks Yoimiya possesses when using Ryuukin Saxifrage. Each stack increases this ATK Bonus by 1%.

passiveTalents.name: Blazing Match
passiveTalents.description: When Yoimiya crafts Decoration, Ornament, and Landscape-type Furnishings, she has a 100% chance to refund a portion of the materials used.

normalAttack.name: Cloud-Grazing Strike
normalAttack.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way. Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

elementalSkill.name: Opening Flourish
elementalSkill.description:
Press
Flourishes her polearm in a cloud-grasping stance, dealing Geo DMG. Hold
Takes up the Opening Flourish stance and charges up, forming a shield. DMG Absorption is based on Yun Jin's Max HP and has 150% effectiveness against all Elemental DMG and Physical DMG.

elementalBurst.name: Cliffbreaker's Banner'
elementalBurst.description:
Deals AoE Geo DMG and grants all nearby party members a Flying Cloud Flag Formation. Flying Cloud Flag Formation
When Normal Attack DMG is dealt to opponents, Bonus DMG will be dealt based on Yun Jin's current DEF. The effects of this skill will be cleared after a set duration or after being triggered a specific number of times.

passiveTalents.name: Light Nourishment
passiveTalents.description: When Perfect Cooking is achieved on Food with Adventure-related effects, there is a 12% chance to obtain double the product.

passiveTalents.name: True to Oneself
passiveTalents.description: Using Opening Flourish at the precise moment when Yun Jin is attacked will unleash its Level 2 Charged (Hold) form.

passiveTalents.name: Breaking Conventions
passiveTalents.description: The Normal Attack DMG Bonus granted by Flying Cloud Flag Formation is further increased by 2. 5%/5%/7. 5%/11.

normalAttack.name: Rain of Stone
normalAttack.description:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 6 consecutive spear strikes. Charged Attack
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way. Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

elementalSkill.name: Dominus Lapidis
elementalSkill.description:
Press
Commands the omnipresent power of earth to solidify into a Stone Stele, dealing AoE Geo DMG. Additionally, the Stone Stele will resonate with other Geo Constructs in the vicinity, dealing Geo DMG to surrounding enemies. The Stone Stele is considered a Geo Construct, and can both be climbed and used to block attacks.

elementalBurst.name: Planet Befall
elementalBurst.description:
Brings a falling meteor down to earth, dealing massive Geo DMG to opponents caught in its AoE and applying the Petrification status to them. Petrification
Opponents affected by the Petrification status cannot move.

passiveTalents.name: Resonant Waves
passiveTalents.description:
When the Jade Shield takes DMG, it will Fortify:

Fortified characters have 5% increased Shield Strength. Can stack up to 5 times, and lasts until the Jade Shield dissapears.

passiveTalents.name: Dominance of Earth
passiveTalents.description:
Zhongli deals bonus DMG based on his Max HP:
Normal Attack, Charged Attack, and Plunging Attack DMG is increased by 1. 39% of Max HP. Dominus Lapidis' Stone Stele, resonance, and hold DMG is increased by 1.

passiveTalents.name: Arcanum of Crystal
passiveTalents.description: Refunds 15% of the ores used when crafting Polearm-type weapons.

normalAttack.name: Flames Weave Life
normalAttack.description: Normal AttackPerforms up to 4 consecutive claymore strikes. Charged Attack Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to perform an especially powerful Severing Splendor strike toward the front. Plunging Attack Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

elementalSkill.name: The Named Moment
elementalSkill.description: Calling upon her authority over conflict, Mavuika summons the All-Fire Armaments passed down through the line of human Archons, dealing Nightsoul-aligned Pyro DMGAfter using this, Mavuika's Nightsoul points are restored to max value, and she enters the Nightsoul's Blessing state.

elementalBurst.name: Hour of Burning Skies
elementalBurst.description: When Mavuika has at least 50% Fighting Spirit, she can consume it all to unleash her Elemental Burst.

passiveTalents.name: Gift of Flaming Flowers
passiveTalents.description: When a nearby party member triggers a Nightsoul Burst, Mavuika's ATK increases by 30% for 10s.

passiveTalents.name: Kiongozi
passiveTalents.description: After using her Elemental Burst, Hour of Burning Skies, every point of Fighting Spirit present when it is used increases the DMG that the current active party member deals by 0.2%. The maximum increase obtainable this way is 40%, and this effect lasts 20s, decaying over this duration until it reaches 0.

passiveTalents.name: Exhaust Mode
passiveTalents.description: After Nightsoul points have been fully depleted, Mavuika will switch to using Phlogiston to maintain the All-Fire Armaments' Flamestrider form.
